marklogic.body:
Yeah, once Santorum drops out, it's pure Mittens v Not Mittens, washed down with a bottle of Doctor Crazy Peepers.Â
Thing is, ol' Doc Craze doesn't look to win any actual states, meaning he's got an artificially low-ceiling from the scraps of delegates he'll pick up in the few share-sies states. Which means Col Newt Beauregard has a very very very thin margin - he can't Depend on reinforcements in taking on the Union devil, he needs to win each & every Bull Shit Run that's anywhere near a fair fight, & he needs the battlefield in Tampa to get so disordered they fail to deliver Romney a first ballot victory then go full frenzy & Burn the joint to the ground.
